loyaltyDescription: To achieve {{status}} status, you need to send invoices or upload and pay bills from entities you own, with a total of {{transaction}} more transactions required before October 2025.
admiinNetworkParntersDescription: Earn Bonus Tax Rewards with you Admiin Network Partners
appleTooltip: Percentage of tax rewards you will earn on this purchase.
rewardMaxStatus: Congratulations! You've reached the highest Admiin Status, you receive the maximum amount of tax rewards for your bills paid
